name: Maria Lopez
bio: Maria is a native Spanish speaker with over 10 years of experience teaching Spanish as a foreign language. She is passionate about helping students learn and enjoy the Spanish language and culture.

name: Jean Baptiste
bio: Jean is a highly experienced French instructor with a deep understanding of French grammar and pronunciation. He enjoys creating engaging lessons that make learning French fun and interactive.

name: Hans MÃ¼ller
bio: Hans is a native German speaker and an enthusiastic instructor. He has a strong background in German literature and culture, and he enjoys sharing his knowledge and love for the German language with his students.

name: Yuki Tanaka
bio: Yuki is a dedicated Japanese instructor with extensive experience teaching Japanese to students of all levels. She has a deep understanding of Japanese grammar and cultural nuances, and she creates a supportive learning environment for her students.
